thread.title: Chrissy Teigen, John Legend expecting first child
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen, John Legend expecting first child

title: Chrissy Teigen, John Legend expecting first child
text:
Chrissy Teigen, John Legend expecting first child Posted: Updated: The singer and model, who recently opened up about their fertility struggles, announced Teigen's pregnancy on Instagram. (Source: CNN) 
LOS ANGELES (CNN) - For Chrissy Teigen and John Legend, the time has finally come. 
Teigen posted on Instagram on Monday that she and Legend were "so happy to announce that we are pregnant." 
The couple's good news comes only a few months after Teigen spoke of their fertility struggles. 
She said people unaware of their troubles would often ask whether they had plans to start a family. 
The pair has been married for two years.
